  • Wordpress

To see local wordpress sites from another computer (server) on a local machine

  • In wordpress Settings->General, both Wordpress Address and Site Address should point to the ip of the hosting computer these correspond to “siteurl” and “home” in the mysql db options table. The url will look something like: http://192.168.1.17/~joseph/spark instead of httpd:localhost/~joseph/spark
  • Fedora has a firewall running by default that wil block access to port 80. To disable it, run: sudo systemctl stop firewalld

PHP

To use phpMyAdmin locally, in the web browser go to localhost/phpmyadmin/

Default userid: root / password: password
